experiences.title: Software Developer
experiences.description: Designed a full-stack AI pipeline using React, IBM Watson STT, LangChain, and GPT-4 to reduce meeting recap load by 50%, analyzed e-commerce conversion funnels via SQL-based cohort models to boost retention by 25%, and collaborated with stakeholders on A/B tests to improve campaign ROI and efficiency.

experiences.title: AI Software Engineer
experiences.description: Trained a YOLOv8 model on 5,000+ annotated images to detect fire and smoke damage, used GPT-4 for cost estimation and damage localization, built Power Automate workflows for CRM updates to reduce issue response time by 30%, and optimized ETL with performant GraphQL resolvers.

experiences.title: Data Scientist
experiences.description: Enhanced digital strategy and online efficiency by 40% for 10+ Indiana businesses, built automated forecasting pipelines using SQL and Python ETL, and delivered Tableau dashboards analyzing FDA drug approvals to increase data visibility by 30%.

projects.title: Business Intelligence
projects.description: Designed a Power BI report to enable quick business insights to clients across all 3 markets which includes marketing, sales, finance, and supply chain. Operated on data set having more than 1000K records to derive useful business insights on 5 different dashboards. Incorporated Power query and DAX for creating calculated columns and measures.

projects.title: YT-Shorts Generator
projects.description: Automated short-form video creation by reducing manual editing time by 60%, leveraging Whisper for transcription and OpenAI or Mistral models for AI-based clip segmentation and suggestion. Synthesized a Reactâ€“LangGraph pipeline fusing LLMs with PostgreSQL for intelligent clip workflows.

projects.title: AI-Grader
projects.description: Harnessed GenerativeAI techniques in natural language processing to generate automated responses to grading prompts using IBM Granite LLM to automate grading, enhancing consistency and efficiency in student assignment evaluations.

projects.title: AI SQLScribe
projects.description: Streamlined text-to-SQL translation with clear instructions with Meta Llama LLM, context provision, examples, and Retrieval Augmented Generation, making data analysis more intuitive and interactive for healthcare professionals.

projects.title: Revenue Insights in Hospitality Domain
projects.description: Prepped a dashboard on Power BI which had Hotel booking data with over 9000 bookings where property's revenue and ratings were demonstrated by key metrics. Applied Do-nut chart to visualize revenue generated by Business and Luxury Category.
